name: Flirt is (not) an option
description:
/!\ The game may bug on your computer, pm us if it's not working!

The finals are almost here, just one week away. Now I’m starting to regret doing nothing during the whole year… All my friends started to study two months ago so I can’t really count on them… I have to study hard by myself and succeed!  Failure isn’t an option! But... Flirting may be one of these options !

Team D(i)eux - The Unholy

Main artist: Aluuka (https://www.facebook.com/AluukaRu/)

Additional artist: Simon Martineau

Special thanks  to  Gabin Jirodet for the support  <3
